intro.subHeading: I build things for the web & windows.
intro.description: I am a Software Developer skilled in building web and desktop applications. I occasionally explore design, adding creativity to my work. Currently, I am focused on enhancing my skills and delivering applications with exceptional user experiences.

description: Hi, I'm Ashu, a passionate developer with a strong interest in building innovative solutions that bridge creativity and technology. I specialize in ReactJS and enjoy crafting dynamic, user-friendly web applications.

Beyond coding, I’m an avid learner, constantly exploring topics in computers, science, and technology to enhance my skills. My curiosity extends to fields like astronomy, nature, and mysteries, which inspire me to think outside the box.

When I’m not working on projects, you’ll likely find me reading, playing chess, experimenting with photography, or staying fit through running and fitness routines. I believe in creating meaningful experiences, whether through my code or the stories I tell through my hobbies. Let’s connect and collaborate!
Here are few technologies I've worked on:
Worked at various small Python projects that required creating GUI based applications.
This was a remote internship and during the internship, I explored various python libraries such as Tkinter, Random, etc.
Some of the projects include, Speed Typing Test, GUI Calculator and Random Password Generator.

workExperience.designation: Junior Software Developer | Digisure Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: Developing high-quality, robust Windows applications coded using C#.
Worked on 5+ Windows Project handling both frontend and database portion.
Some of the projects include, Paroso Bhojan, Smart Desktop, Database Comparison Tool, IESCMS, etc.
Contributed small changes to few web projects too.

majorProjects.description: A simple and straighforward frontend project built using ReactJS and Json Server. Created this project to learn and practice CRUD operations in ReactJS.
A Windows based multi-tanent POS Applicatoin build for restaurants. Build using Syncfusion components for minimal and modern look.
Tweaked version of Google Keep. Build using ReactJS as frontend and Motoko as backend.

otherProjects.description: A Windows application build for comparing two databases. The comparison includes Tables, Procedures, Functions & Triggers.
A simple todo application, build using ReacJS.
This project was part of a Python Internship. A simple Python Deskotp application to test you typing speed.
One of my company projects. I implemented Image Zooming functionaliy, Gibbrish Detection and added other small features.
One of my initial frontend projects. Cloned Google Search, Google Advanced Search and Google Image Search. (Github has marked it as Phishing Webpage)
One of the company projects. Implemented various weighment print formats.
One of the company projects. Designed frontend for some important tables and ability to perform CRUD operations on them without directly interacting with database.
One of my initial ReactJS learning projects. A simple webapplication to generate memes with random API fetched images.
One fo my company projects. Created an utility software to easily clean old files from directory and it's sub-directories based on custom fiters.

contact.description: I am actively looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
